subject: Measures of Secure Coding & How to apply Secure Coding Standards?
Description: Up to 90% of software security problems are caused by coding errors, which is why secure coding practices and secure coding standards are essential.

subject: Hacktoberfest & Open Source 2021
Description: In this episode, we talk about Open Source and the annual event Hacktoberfest. We answer your questions about getting started with Open Source, the best practices, and how it could help advance your career.
